entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 3:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: SSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or freezing rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
